title: Barracuda CloudGen Firewall
description: The dashboard provides a visual summary of firewall activity, security events, user access, and system health to help monitor and analyze network security in real time.

definition.content:
The Barracuda CloudGen Firewall Dashboard is a centralized interface that provides an overview of firewall status, network activity, security threats, and system performance. It offers real-time monitoring and analytics, making it easier for administrators to manage network security efficiently.

**Key Features**

- System Overview
- Traffic Monitoring
- Security Insights
- VPN & Remote Access
- Event Logs & Alerts
- Reporting & Analytics
- Configuration & Policy Management

definition.title: All CloudGen Logs Over Event Time

definition.content: Provides informational log files about login and access attempts to the CloudGen Firewall, displaying access source, and opening and closing of sessions.

definition.title: List of Total loggedIn Users of Auth Access
Total Number Of Auth Access Status Types
Most Recent Closed Sessions by Users

definition.content: Contains log files generated by operational events.

definition.title: Total Operative Events for each User

definition.content: Contains log files generated by Event events.

Contains log files about login, authentication, and connection status of administrative sessions by displaying IP address and port, and shows the operative processes initiated by the administrative instance.

definition.title: Top Reasons for Config Admin Events

definition.content: Displays informational logs about processes concerning configuration changes such as adding or removing services and activation processes.
Contains log files about downloading processes initiated by the configuration daemon, providing information concerning progress, changes, and signatures.

definition.title: List Of Config Daemon Download Users
Config Daemon Download Event Time Count
Most Common Config Daemon Download Events

definition.content: Displays log files concerning synchronization processes, showing connection details, update status, and progress.
Contains log files for administration, authentication processes, and access information concerning user groups, access interfaces, and domains of external authentication services.
Displays log files concerning general firewall configuration changes, ruleset updates, including operation details and time settings.

definition.title: Top Firewall Events From Blocked Host

definition.content: Displays firewall log files providing in-depth information about firewall rule processing

definition.title: Top Firewall Activity IPs From Allowed Ip List
Top Firewall Activity Logs From Blocked IP List
Top Reasons For Firewall Activity Events

definition.content: Contains log files generated by the Intrusion Prevention System, showing database file download status and information.

definition.content: Displays log files generated by ATP, IPS, DNS Sinkhole, and the Virus Scanner.

definition.title: Top Reasons For Firewall Threat Events

definition.content: Contains system log files related to management access.
Displays log files about internal processes that are generated by the box ssh daemon, such as connection details, data transfer, and session behavior.
